Learn DataKund
**************

* `How to post in Instagram automatically <https://datakund-docs.readthedocs.io/en/latest/Insta%20Post%20Bot.html>`_
* `How to send connection requests to all profiles in search results in all pages <https://datakund-docs.readthedocs.io/en/latest/LinkedIn%20Connection%20Sending.html>`_
* `How to Scrape result count for all the keywords given? <https://datakund-docs.readthedocs.io/en/latest/Google%20Search%20Keyword.html>`_
* `How to Upload Video on YouTube? <https://datakund-docs.readthedocs.io/en/latest/YouTube%20Video%20Uploader.html>`_
* `How to create Amazon Product Result Page Scraper Bot <https://datakund-docs.readthedocs.io/en/latest/Amazon%20Product%20Result%20Page%20Scraper.html>`_
* `How to create a bot for scrape top reviews of amazon product <https://datakund-docs.readthedocs.io/en/latest/Scrape%20Top%20Reviews%20of%20Amazon%20Product.html>`_
* `How to like any post in Instagram? <https://datakund-docs.readthedocs.io/en/latest/Instagram%20Auto%20Like%20Bot.html>`_
* `How to follow someone in Instagram automatically? <https://datakund-docs.readthedocs.io/en/latest/Instagram%20Auto%20Follow%20Bot.html>`_
* `How to post in Instagram automatically <https://datakund-docs.readthedocs.io/en/latest/Profile%20Backlink%20Automation%20bot.html>`_
